item.description: Our friend Peter West is performing in the "Perfect Spot of Tea" series at the Porter Phelps Huntington Museum in Hadley. Their duo is called "West and Jackson" and will play jazz guitar selections. There is a $10 admission charge which includes tea, pastries, and music. The performance lasts 1 hour so plan to get there a little bit early so we can sit together and enjoy the whole show. Here is more info: http://www.pphmuseum.... Sounds like a wonderful summer afternoon event in a beautiful setting. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Performance will be on the veranda
item.name: Peter West Jazz Guitar Performance
